ModMetaData.name: House Atreides Faction
ModMetaData.author: Zalera
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the noble and disciplined House Atreides from the Dune universe as a new faction in RimWorld.
This mod includes: - A custom House Atreides faction with honorable ideology and structured military behavior - Four unique Atreides unit types, each equipped with distinct armor from the Dune: Atreides Armor and Weapons mod - Full integration with custom weapons and apparel provided by the dependency mod
Requires: "Dune - Atreides Armour and Weapon Pack" (Steam ID: 3441453108)
Created for RimWorld 1.6
